title: 🚀 Cravli
description:
Cravli is your real-time AI dietician, offering voice-based meal planning tailored to your goals. Just speak, and Cravli crafts a personalized meal plan instantly. No more guesswork—just science-backed nutrition, smart grocery lists, and adaptive AI tracking to help you eat better effortlessly.

🎙️ Voice AI Nutrition | 🥗 Tailored Meal Plans | 🤖 Smart Adaptation

🔗 Try Cravli today! cravli.com
